void addTerms(Collection<String> terms)
Add terms to the query.

Parameters:

addTerm

void addTerm(String term)
Add term to the query.

Parameters:

addTermWithStem

void addTermWithStem(String term,
                     String stem)
Add term with a stemmed term. The query search with the stemmed term.

Parameters:
term - the term
stem - the stemmed value of the term. It will be used for the search.

getTermStemPairs

Map<String,String> getTermStemPairs()
Get the term stem pairs. It contains those terms too which add with addTerm(String) and addTerms(Collection) in this way the pair key and value contains same string.

Returns:
with the map

getSearchTerms

Collection<String> getSearchTerms()
Get search terms. This will be used for search.

Returns:
the searched terms
